subject: Football
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: The shock is not that a fading star is reported to have obtained human growth hormone. The shock would be to discover that more than a few men in football are completely clean.
snippet: The shock is not that a fading star is reported to have obtained human growth hormone. The shock would be to discover that more than a few men in football are completely clean.
